page.title: 18A WEEK IN THE LIFE OF JUN. 4
page.content: {Monday:}Assembly followed by P.E which we all enjoy.Then maths until break. After break more maths followed by language work until lunchtime.The afternoon consists of religious, spelling,music and Radio Club. {Tuesday:}Hymns followed by maths which most of us{HATE!}then break.After that {BATHS}for one and a half hours until lunchtime.In the afternoon we have spelling and art and craft. {Wednesday:}Orchestra or project until break.Maths followed by story writing. In the afternoon we have spellings, religious and topic work. {Thursday:}Choir until break then we have our radio programme called "In The News" followed by maths.After lunch environmental studies then{GAMES {Friday:}Special class assemblies,maths and spelling tests.Afternoon,house_ points,library,individual projects.
